scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy elviskrop/swarm-markets-rinkeby subgraph.rinkeby.yaml --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph deploy protofire/swarm-markets-mumbai subgraph.mumbai.yaml --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy protofire/swarm-markets subgraph.yaml --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
